snippet: Dr. Bruce Aylward said the crisis could be stopped completely, but only if funding continues and health workers can build trust in wary communities.
abstract: World Health Organization says that African Ebola outbreak could be halted by summer if international financial support continues, and that $400 million is needed to continue fighting disease through June.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Bruce Aylward said the crisis could be stopped completely, but only if funding continues and health workers can build trust in wary communities.

headline.main: Ebola Outbreak Could Be Ended by Summer, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Africa; Sustained Aid Is Needed to Halt Ebola, W.H.O. Says
